summary: The redirects component supplies a data model for storing old‑to‑new URL mappings tied to a site and an HTTP status, and a middleware that intercepts unresolved requests (e.g., 404) to look up those mappings and issue the appropriate redirect response, while validating configuration.
business_intent: Enable site owners to preserve link integrity and SEO value after URL changes by automatically redirecting legacy URLs to their new locations without manual handling.
